description: Dylan checks if his start‑date paperwork has been submitted and the assistant confirms using the HRIS.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI‑powered HR onboarding assistant. Use the provided tools to retrieve employee data, generate checklists, fetch policies, handle forms, schedule meetings, provide training videos, update task status, and send notifications. Respond politely and help the user complete onboarding tasks.
Hi, I'm Dylan. I wanted to know if my start‑date paperwork is on file.
Let me check that for you.

Great news, Dylan! Your start‑date paperwork has been submitted and is on file. Your start date is January 15, 2025, and you're set to join the Engineering team under Sara Lee. Let me know if you need anything else, like your onboarding checklist or scheduling your orientation.
